Game: My SAT Coach 2008-09-23T00:00:00-07:00 My SAT Coach is a game on the Nintendo DS that helps students prepare for the Scholastic Aptitude Test (SAT), a common standardized college-entry exam for American high school students. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/eb1b2613-4afb-4510-9242-f9ac088d0997.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/af471e41-cb06-4cff-9228-d37e131ea482.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/00b2aac2-6978-4851-88bb-102a0e32486c.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/63ede1c0-3d6b-4f54-ab70-4c0a4cd67a6d.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/My_SAT_Coach Ubisoft Montreal Ubisoft
